SEARCH

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Simple domain model for a game record.

Fields are validated in setters so the object can’t exist in a bad state. Used by both the CLI and DB layers.

Role in the system: a small, safe data holder with guardrails. Keep it boring and predictable (stable).

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int id, String name, String platform, Game.Status status, int priority, Game.Ownership ownership)
      Build a fully-initialized Game. All fields are validated via setters.
      Parameters:
      id - unique id (> 0)
      name - non-blank title
      platform - non-blank platform label (e.g., PC, PS5, Switch)
      status - current progress (not null)
      priority - 1–5 (1=low urgency, 5=high)
      ownership - PHYSICAL or DIGITAL (not null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any value fails validation
